error.request_param_invalid: Invalid value for «{{parameter}}» parameter in request
error.account_not_registered: This account is not yet registered
error.attempt_to_reuse_token: Attempt to reuse a refresh token
error.same_email: New email address is the same

register.mail_body:
Hello,
Your validation code for the creation of an account is {{code}}.
If your are not the initiator of this request, simply ignore this message.

account_deletion.mail_body:
Hello,
Your validation code for the definitive deletion of your account is {{code}}.
If your are not the initiator of this request, simply ignore this message.

change_email.mail_body:
Hello,
Your validation code to change the email address of your account is {{code}}.
If your are not the initiator of this request, simply ignore this message.

unlock_account_email.mail_body:
Hello,
Validation code to unlock your account is {{code}}.
If your are not the initiator of this request, simply ignore this message.

register_attempt_with_used_email.mail_body:
Hello,
An attempt was done to create an account with this e-mail address
If your are the initiator of this request, please connect with your credentials or reinitialize your password. Otherwise, simply ignore this message.
register_attempt_with_used_email.mail_title: [Comaint] registration attempt with an already used e-mail
